name: Rodent Run
description:
RODENT RUN Yes, HE'S BACK!  Your favourite rodent returns for a new adventure - and this time he's in an unprecedented 2.5D!

Sneak and jump with lethal precision as a chubby hamster named Hampton in the shadowy world of Meowcatraz. Armed with nothing but your NBA height jumps, you must pass the cat guards with discretion and move without detection, unless you want some serious hammifications. 

ONLY THE UNSEEN SURVIVE!
  • MORE THAN 2 CRAZY LEVELS TO EXPLORE!
  • MULTIPLE ENEMIES TO AVOID!
  • Developed using our exclusively licensed Ultra Nebulon Integrated Turbo Yottabyte ( UNITY) Engine.
  • RUN LEFT! RUN RIGHT! JUMP UP! FALL DOWN! Now with even more directions to explore this psychedelic world
  • INCREDIBLE life-like graphics thanks to our inbuilt Super Charge™ 420 chipset
  • Music performed by New York's Finest Jazz Quintet "The Meowvelous 5"

Programming - Bradley Jones

Art - Ruben Gardiner

Music & Sound - Isabella Lau

We'd love to hear feedback from you all and feel free to share your high score too!
